column5: Sharpening my treble hooks, applying my devcon 2ton to my muskie glidebaits, and thinking of 2010 summer fishing.  http://wtfcalls.net/reddit/xmas_light_wtf.php
A Merry Christmas to you as well... but I've sharpened my baits and I'll be out tomorrow !! lol

Merry christmass to you also,shaping mine up or the bows tommorrow.I told my 2 girls to ask santa for 2 plainer boards for dad for xmass.They think its for tobaginning.   :w00t:Cheers and happy holidays
That '' Prank '' is something else right there.....     But dude ,,, hold offf on the Merry Christmas will ya..    Still 20 something odd days away
Merry Christmas back to you and good prank in the link.   Art
note to self: do not hand out credit card to wife.

Would also like to wish everybody happy holidays and a safe and happy hardwater season. I myself am making a jump to Ice fishing, and 99% sure I'll be joining that Bass Fishing Tournament club in Lindsay during the bass season, hopefully tournament fishing gets me to learn a few times.  Now most importantly, how many more days until the BPS spring classic??   Merry Christmas, MTBF
